title: Contingency Tables
body: Suppose we take a simple random sample of $$402$$ jazz artists in NYC. Of $$301$$ people that primarily practice at night, $$252$$ of them play Guitar, $$12$$ play Piano, and $$37$$ play the Saxophone. Of $$101$$ people that primarily practice during the day, $$48$$ play Guitar, $$30$$ play Piano, and $$23$$ play the Saxophone.
